campaigns.text_content: {{PreviewText}} {% if PreviewText %}Â â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ Â â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ {% endif %} {{FirstName|default("Hello")}}, As temperatures rise across Ohio, we want to ensure that no family has to choose between staying cool and paying other essential bills. The Ohio Summer Crisis Program is now accepting applications, and we encourage eligible households to enroll as soon as possible. What is the Summer Crisis Program? The Summer Crisis Program provides financial assistance to help eligible Ohio households pay their electric bills during the hot summer months. This vital program helps families maintain air conditioning and other essential cooling services when they need them most. Program Benefits: Financial assistance with electric bills to maintain cooling Help preventing service disconnections Support for reconnection of previously disconnected service Peace of mind during Ohio's hottest months Don't Wait - Apply Today Summer temperatures can be dangerous, especially for vulnerable populations including young children, elderly residents, and those with health conditions. The Summer Crisis Program is designed to ensure that all Ohio families can stay safe and comfortable during the hottest months of the year. Funding is limited and distributed on a first-come, first-served basis, so we encourage you to apply as early as possible. Don't let the summer heat become a crisis for your family. GET STARTED These are the potential improvements we will make in your home once you appl GET STARTED GET STARTED {{SenderInfo}} Unsubscribe from this list

Here's what this really means: If you were already stretching to pay your bills before, you're now going to be deeper in the hole every month. That can add up to financial disaster fast. GET STARTED Three Programs Can Stop This Crisis â€“ But Only If You Act NOW This isn't "maybe" help â€“ this is guaranteed money if you qualify: Home Energy Assistance Program (HEAP/LIHEAP) Cash assistance that pays your electric bill directly Available RIGHT NOW through your local provider This money goes straight to your utility â€“ you never see the bill Home Weatherization Assistance Program (HWAP) FREE home improvements that cut your bills permanently Could save you {{MonthlySaving}} every month for years Professional contractors do the work at no cost to you Your bills stay lower even when rates keep rising PIPP Plus (Percentage of Income Payment Plan) Pay based on what you earn, not what you use No more bill shock â€“ same payment every month regardless of usage Why Waiting Even One More Day is Dangerous Funding runs out â€“ These programs have limited money and it's first-come, first-served Your debt keeps growing â€“ Every day you pay full price is money you'll never get back Disconnection risk increases â€“ Utilities can shut off service for non-payment Other bills suffer â€“ Money going to electric bills can't pay for rent, food, or medications Don't Let Pride Cost You Hundreds of Dollars You've already PAID for these programs through your taxes.Â This is your money, designed specifically for situations like this. Using these programs isn't charity â€“ it's smart financial planning. campaigns.text_content: {{PreviewText}} {% if PreviewText %}Â â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ Â â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ {% endif %} Summertime is meant for later days, warm nights and an occasional splash at the local pool. But this year, it also means a surge to your energy bills. According to news outlets, every Ohio electric utility in Ohio is expected to raise rates this summer, some as much as 36%. We project you are already paying about {{monthlycost}} per month in energy bills. Imagine adding 20-30-35% to that! With all the stresses of managing a family budget, this summertime surge is sure to hit your pocketbook hard. Ohio's Energy Assistance Programs Can Help We're here to help keep money in your pocket for the things that matter. Through Ohio's energy assistance programs, we think we can save you about {{monthlysavings}} per month. That's real financial relief, allowing you to better care for yourself and your family. All you have to do is start the process by clicking below! GET STARTED We will assign you a case manager when you submit the form. These are the potential improvements we will make in your home once you appl GET STARTED GET STARTED {{SenderInfo}} Unsubscribe from this list

campaigns.text_content: {{PreviewText}} {% if PreviewText %}Â â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ Â â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ â€ŒÂ {% endif %} Summertime is meant for later days, warm nights and an occasional splash at the local pool. But this year, it also means a surge to your energy bills. According to news outlets, every Ohio electric utility in Ohio is expected to raise rates this summer, some as much as 36%. We project you are already paying about {{MonthlyCost}} per month in energy bills. Imagine adding 20-30-35% to that! With all the stresses of managing a family budget, this summertime surge is sure to hit your pocketbook hard. Ohio's Energy Assistance Programs Can Help We're here to help keep money in your pocket for the things that matter. Through Ohio's energy assistance programs, we think we can save you about {{MonthlySaving}} per month. That's real financial relief, allowing you to better care for yourself and your family. All you have to do is start the process by clicking below! GET STARTED We will assign you a case manager when you submit the form. These are the potential improvements we will make in your home once you appl GET STARTED GET STARTED {{SenderInfo}} Unsubscribe from this list
